Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: The Australian social media world is buzzing as people eagerly await the 2021 Federal Budget. With many calling for increased support for pressing issues like homelessness healthcare and welfare Treasurer Jim Chalmers has his work cut out for him. Meanwhile the Labor party has received flak for not raising the jobseeker rate while the LNP demands full funding for Rockhampton's Ring Road. It remains to be seen how the budget will address these pressing concerns as individuals continue to express their thoughts and opinions in the virtual arena.
